sourcesContent: import React from 'react'; import { Box, Typography, Paper, Button, Divider, Grid, Chip, List, ListItem, ListItemIcon, ListItemText } from '@mui/material'; import { Description, Print, CheckCircleOutline, TrendingDown, TrendingUp, Storage, Psychology, Assignment } from '@mui/icons-material'; import { BarChart, Bar, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, ResponsiveContainer } from 'recharts'; import { salesData, insights } from '../data/analyticsData'; const ReportSection = ({ title, children, icon }) => ( {icon} {title} {children} ); const Reports = () => { const handlePrint = () => { window.print(); }; const currentDate = new Date().toLocaleDateString('en-US', { weekday: 'long', year: 'numeric', month: 'long', day: 'numeric' }); return ( {/* Action Bar */} {/* Report Container */} {/* Header */} BUSINESS ANALYTICS REPORT Strategic Analysis & Recommendations Date: {currentDate} | Prepared by: Analytics Team {/* 1. Introduction */} }> This report provides a comprehensive analysis of recent business performance, specifically focusing on sales volatility observed in Q1. Uses data-driven methodologies to identify root causes and proposes strategic interventions to restore growth trajectories. {/* 2. Problem Statement */} }> Core Issue: Unexplained Sales Decline Despite a positive start to the year, sales revenue dropped by 33% in March. Simultaneously, customer churn rates in the 'High Value' segment increased by 12%. The primary objective is to diagnose the drivers of this decline and forecast recovery paths. {/* 3. Data Description */} }> Dataset Source Internal ERP & CRM Systems Key Variables Analyzed {['Sales Volume', 'Unit Price', 'Customer Complaints', 'Competitor Offers', 'Profit Margin'].map((tag) => ( ))} {/* 4. Methodology */} }> We employed a three-tiered analytical approach: {/* 5. Analysis */} }> Q1 Performance Visualization: The chart below illustrates the correlation between the sales dip and the strategic price increase in March. Figure 1: Sales vs Profit Analysis (Jan - Jun) {/* 6. Findings */} }> {insights.map((item, idx) => ( {item.text} Root Cause: {item.reason} ))} {/* 7. Recommendations */} }> Price Adjustment Stratgey: Immediate reduction of unit price to â‚¹110 is recommended. Predictive models suggest this will recover sales volume by 20% within 30 days. Competitor Counter-Strategy: Launch a targeted loyalty bonus program during known competitor discount windows to insulate high-value customers. Inventory Optimization: Shift marketing budget towards the 'Beauty' category which currently yields the highest profit margin (60%). {/* 8. Conclusion */} }> The analysis confirms that the sales decline was a direct consequence of high price sensitivity which was exploited by competitor activity. The business remains fundamentally strong, with high demand potential. Implementing the recommended pricing adjustments and loyalty initiatives will likely reverse the negative trend and ensure Q2 targets are met. {/* Footer */} generated by Analytics Pro System ); }; export default Reports;
